title: Hiver Account & Mailbox Setup || Shop Harbour

signals.problem_statement: The customer lacks visibility into individual inboxes, which can lead to communication breakdowns when team members are unavailable.
signals.customer_ask: More information on how the email flow works.
signals.suggested_solution: A tech demo on the difference between the growth and elite plans.
signals.context: Small team of 2 to 200, handling a high volume of customer relationships.

signals.problem_statement: The customer is concerned about the manual approach to managing emails in shared mailboxes, which may lead to inefficiencies.
signals.suggested_solution: Automation to push emails from individual inboxes to shared mailboxes.
signals.context: Small team of 2 to 200, handling a high volume of customer relationships.
